title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 416.4 - Vehicle speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 416.4 - Vehicle speed limits

State Regulations
(a) A rate of
speed by a motor vehicle in excess of 25 miles per hour is prohibited, except
where specifically permitted by signs or as stated in subdivision (b) of this
section. (b) On Barnhart Island, Robert Moses State Park, the Island Road, Long Sault Road and Massena Point

Road and other roads connecting with park facilities a rate of speed in excess
of 40 miles per hour is prohibited. (c) A rate of speed by motor vehicles in
excess of 15 miles per hour is prohibited on campsite driveways or parking
fields. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
416.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
